display_long_description:
Exercise the mind, body & soul in this fast-paced feast of micro challenges, high intensity boss battles and a concoction of collectibles that unravel as you jog across vibrant backdrops of color and joy.

# RUN FOR YOUR LIFE
Get physical with lifelike jog-in-place controls or stick with the less intensive arm-swing mode as you run for your life through the bright and stylish world of madness.

[media]


# MINIGAME MADNESS

Match, Catch, Pop, Chop, Hack, Slash and Bash your way through quick-thinking showdowns that block your path forward to each castle lair!                                

[media]


# HURRY, HURRY, HURRY
It’s a race against time as every passing second drains from the longevity of your beating heart.

[media]


# MASTER THEM ALL
Master all hazard and showdown challenges with the help of collectible character cards found throughout the world. Learn their weakness and let ‘em have it!

[media]


# SUBSTANCE AND STYLE
Unlock hands and tombstones to make a statement during your run, and even after death.

[media]


# LEVEL UP
Spend the RO (Royal Offspring) that you’ve saved from each castle lair on valuable upgrades to increase your sword, shield or heart duration.

[media]

# RUN FOR YOUR LIFE

Match, Catch, Pop, Chop, Hack, Slash and Bash your way through quick-thinking showdowns that block your path forward to each castle lair!                                

![{"height":1080,"type":"image","width":1920}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/86659801_2932247743583077_7417664589811237837_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=MTHPaQlSWRcQ7kNvwFvf90K&_nc_oc=Adn3ZoLo-d-tRuQosUg7eY2bjil8xnmmosYRV83LLJPjfnHSZr17fgher1N2hIYFeJs&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfKbExqVwXM2u-ibeTSbx-3jbDzOPrv_OU-85PnJX1HIhw&oe=682BF8AA)


# HURRY, HURRY, HURRY
It’s a race against time as every passing second drains from the longevity of your beating heart.

![{"height":984,"type":"image","width":1748}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507165_447221264980420_8367178254206728213_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=4aPyZJbKw9QQ7kNvwFjtnzG&_nc_oc=AdnX-x9wueRAgD4h3nnp0VPhs65KszmvW1R3PjcMTOvXBIzUhBVwoLjXQwqGOcEuJfg&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfI5eaptWgKQsjulwjUMRdAYm_UGKVLowSkHYZ9gduqjOQ&oe=682BE912)


# MASTER THEM ALL
Master all hazard and showdown challenges with the help of collectible character cards found throughout the world. Learn their weakness and let ‘em have it!

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57570293_4078635569072597_4548948488473550523_n.png?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Jk4v5nq1At0Q7kNvwGWr2mZ&_nc_oc=AdlRtQ7zxf4WF8aGxZ-gAlaY6Kv_l64cQb3_d5Oa--jeHL7LgsAo94QBQcF3ojzH5fY&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfJj6PzLdQmlXU5kBc7L5R-xfSbcYncAlMFFUhtowFSKvw&oe=682BEFED)


# SUBSTANCE AND STYLE
Unlock hands and tombstones to make a statement during your run, and even after death.

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982723_2208705096178691_3774754884521119372_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=YS6Ei77QhRoQ7kNvwHzypMp&_nc_oc=AdkQdHvd_h3yxaMpeqY_8FgmaelsKsinL-txfumKLGBnAA9CqFUPukY6e_JvBZPAL-o&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfI-qeJyd54_WgyQ1rNA_9UwXOqD60vcoKa5OtIyQwCK_g&oe=682BCC10)


# LEVEL UP
Spend the RO (Royal Offspring) that you’ve saved from each castle lair on valuable upgrades to increase your sword, shield or heart duration.

![{"height":1080,"type":"image","width":1920}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57566682_1730682357765277_5286327356836676334_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=hBeIgLAC6rIQ7kNvwEUCP1m&_nc_oc=AdkCfLNw0uYpfu7j1YGOMzZbCjiYWdOg84su5hqXY4KP-N0QXBN5MnyToIYeoG-9KO8&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfLVsldyo3-jjYs90WdH-iiPha2la8xdfu9HqWCZVKtPPw&oe=682BF8A3)
